clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Idelalisib is indicated in the treatment of chronic lymphocytic leukemia CLL relapsed follicular B cell non Hodgkin lymphoma FL and relapsed small lymphocytic lymphoma SLL For the treatment of relapsed CLL it is currently indicated as a second line agent in combination with rituximab in patients for whom rituximab alone would be considered appropriate therapy due to other co morbidities while in the treatment of FL and SLL it is intended to be used in patients who have received at least two prior systemic therapies
